ISSUE.TITLE: Cannot change form key in UI Modeler
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: To replicate: Create a form in the modeler Save Click on the form icon Click on the edit pencil (Edit model details) Change the Form Key Save Click on the edit pencil - the form key does not change Note: Changing the form key when saving from the Form Editor works fine.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix Model save issue with model key #398
